subject: Re: Pages still needing redirect
preview: Hi Heath,  I hope you are well and had a good weekend?  Great, thanks for actioning! The client was going to try and do their part last night. I'll let you know if there are any issues.  Thanks, Laura

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

I hope you are well and had a good weekend?

Great, thanks for actioning! The client was going to try and do their part last night. I'll let you know if there are any issues.

Thanks,
Laura

Hi Laura, 

Hope you had a good weekend! 

We have setup all of the redirects as promised. We just require the client to unpublish/deactivate the individual coffee machine landing page and the 12 individual product pages. Once this is done the redirects will work. Unfortunately we don't have enough permission to do this part for them. This is the page the redirects all point to: https://shop.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/view/lavazza-business-solutions/617

Let me know if you have any questions.

@heath All good now on creating the page. 

https://shop.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/view/lavazza-business-solutions/617

Please head to the Lavazza Business Solutions website to view our range of coffee machines. 

[Button]Continue[/button] with this link: https://www.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/commercial-coffee-products/coffee-machines/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @joel a neto request please. Let’s chat about this one.

Hi Heath,

The client has approved this approach, please proceed and let me know when it can be completed by.

Thanks!
Laura

On Thu, 15 Apr 2021 at 12:08, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>> wrote:
Hi Laura,

Probably 2 business days should do the trick : )

Thanks and speak soon,
Heath Maguire
DIRECTOR

Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>

<https://wpperk.com/>

> On 14 Apr 2021, at 4:37 pm, Laura Harrington <laura@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:laura@brandchemistry.com.au>> wrote:
>
> Hi Heath,
>
> Great, thanks - thanks makes sense to me. Let me check with Laura M to make sure she's happy with this approach. If she says yes- when can you get this done by?
>
> Thanks!
> Laura
>
> On Wed, 14 Apr 2021 at 14:28, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>> wrote:
> Hi Laura,
>
> It’s not a bad amount of traffic surprisingly.
>
> I recommend we setup a landing page with a button/link that sends them to the new coffee machine page on the WordPress site… Does that work for you?
>
> We would also need to unpublish the machines that are currently loading on the Neto site.
>
> Thanks,
> Heath Maguire
> DIRECTOR
>
> Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
> Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
> Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
>
> <https://wpperk.com/>

>> On 14 Apr 2021, at 12:24 pm, Laura Harrington <laura@brandchemistry.com.au <mailto:laura@brandchemistry.com.au>> wrote:
>>
>> Hi Heath,
>>
>> Thanks for your time on the call just then - I've pulled the data from GA for each of the coffee machines that are currently sitting on NETO. Please find the document here. <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1SA4R2OHepoUo8bx6X3AULL9JtMk39yUVgomYDO4Lg4M/edit?usp=sharing> What would your recommendation be now seeing the numbers?
>>
>> Thanks!
>> Laura
>>
>> On Tue, 13 Apr 2021 at 13:14, Heath Maguire <heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>> wrote:
>> Hi Laura,
>>
>> Yes I’m good, hope you guys are well too.
>>
>> Regarding the below, Neto doesn’t actually give the ability to redirect to another domain e.g. lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au <http://lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/>. It only lets you add a redirect to an existing page within the Neto application.
>>
>> So the only option would be to unpublish the coffee machines on the Neto site, so at least they can’t be found. Yes, we miss out on transferring the rankings over, but it seems to be the only solution.
>>
>> Let me know what you think? Thanks,
>> Heath Maguire
>> DIRECTOR
>>
>> Phone: 1300 072 134 <tel:1300%20072%20134>
>> Mobile: 0415 162 271 <tel:0415%20162%20271>
>> Email: heath@wpperk.com <mailto:heath@wpperk.com>
>>
>> <https://wpperk.com/>
>>

See here: https://shop.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/shop/all-coffee-machines/504 <https://shop.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/shop/all-coffee-machines/504>
>>> Can you please make sure that these are all going to the WordPress site? Either the main coffee machines hope page OR if there's a specific machine that is on the WP site, that it goes there?
>>> https://www.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/commercial-coffee-products/coffee-machines/ <https://www.lavazzabusinesssolutions.com.au/commercial-coffee-products/coffee-machines/>
>>>
>>> Please let me know if you have any questions? Happy to jump on a call.
>>>
>>> Thanks!
>>> Laura
